column4: Ugh -- I just got a new 1920x1200 monitor and ubuntu's not behaving well with the resolution
it should just be one line you need to add to xorg.conf
-- as far as I can tell, it's got that line already.
if its the only resolution you want, remove all the other lines
in section screen and subsection display have only this
well, i'm seeing about 3 different screens come up
i had problems in the past, but now i just give it no other option except 1920x1200 and it doesnt ever complain
I tried that, but I still am in 1024 x 768. I've got a "Section 'Monitor'" with a bunch of modelines
with resolutions and a lot of other info
try commenting out all the modelines
x shoud detect that stuff automatically now, its not really needed
I'm even more lost now. I tried using the KDE command center to set up the monitor
